channel.title: Martin Biondi Sarra
channel.description: Martin Biondi Sarra, Electronic Engineer and Automation Consultant.

item.title: Industrial Process Simulator
item.description: Implementation of an industrial process simulator from chemical and physical equations. Design of a modular programming framework to allow block reutilization. Validation of models with real-world data from the nitrate plant.

item.title: Pellet Extruder
item.description: Design of 8 process view panels for tactile HMI. Programming of control logic & operator workplace interface. Optimization of client/server & control network.

item.title: Asphalt Plant
item.description: Interaction with YPF engineers and operators to determine the best automation solution. Successful proposal of hardware improvements not considered in the commercial offer. Design and supervision of layouts and connection diagrams for 9 control cabinets. Network architecture design and setup (PROFIBUS, Modulebus and virtualized servers). Design of 15 workplace panels based on P&IDs and surveys conducted in the asphalt plant. Implementation of path finding algorithm in real time integrated with Batch Management. Fist project in Latin America to use System 800xA 6.0 along with Batch Management.

item.title: Pos Assembly And Repair Line
item.description: Technical and financial product evaluation. Supervision of assembly line and repairing laboratory (in charge of technical staff). Organization of production and inventory.

item.title: Mini Bhs Assembly Line
item.description: Technical feasibility analysis. Organization of work using Gantt Diagram. Production rate estimation for resource planning. Negotiation with local and international suppliers.

item.title: Statheros : 3 Axis Camera Stabilizer
item.description: Statheros is a 3-axis camera stabilizer which uses brushless DC motors to compensate disturbances in inclination due to the shaky movement of the cameraman. Its main area of application is in the film industry, aiming to replace the outdated Steadicam technology with its compact form-factor, lightweight design and intuitive user interface.
